aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Base

  • Object
    • Base

  • public class Base
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Bases. Bases are virtual areas used by the AI to locate the most important places on the map.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
